name: Abilities

description: The base dragon’s Hit Dice remain the same, but it loses any Constitution bonus to its hit points (see Abil-ities, below). However, a skeletal dragon gains bonus hitpoints equal to its HD.
name: Hit Dice

description: Same as the base dragon, except that skeletal dragons cannot make crush attacks.
name: Attacks

description: As undead, skeletal dragons are immune to any- thing that requires a Fortitude save unless it affects objects.
name: Saves

description: A skeletal dragon retains the base dragon’s Strength, Dexterity, and Charisma scores. Being undead, askeletal dragon has no Constitution score. It also has noIntelligence score. Its Wisdom score becomes 10.
name: Abilities

description: A skeletal dragon loses all skill ranks and racial skill bonuses possessed by the base dragon.
name: Skills

description: A skeletal dragon loses all feats possessed by the base dragon. It gains Improved Initiative as a bonus feat.
name: Feats
